channel.title: Priest Revive Changes
channel.description:
Some bird from another kingdom told me that the priest's revive was eaten up by a shitty butler or a fool.
People say Priest should become occupy immune. I feel like otherwise.
My changes: * When priest is occupied when using revive, revive is not wasted.
This makes revive not become 100% unstoppable so unseen/cult still have a way of countering the revive if must. Occupy immune would mean that revive can just work without fail.
(I'd implement this like how possess works with the possessor, the possess isn't used up on fail)
